name: node-binance-trader
description: Auto trader to trade signals from your BitcoinVsAltcoins.com strategy selection.

IS_NOTIFIER_GMAIL_ENABLED.description: Selects if Gmail will be used (Enable less secure apps https://myaccount.google.com/lesssecureapps)

IS_NOTIFIER_TELEGRAM_ENABLED.description: Selects if Telegram will be used

NOTIFIER_TELEGRAM_API_KEY.description: Telegram Key for your bot (To create one follow https://core.telegram.org/bots#6-botfather)

NOTIFIER_TELEGRAM_RECEIVER_ID.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

IS_BUY_QTY_FRACTION.description: Uses the 'Quantity to Buy' from the NBT Hub as a fraction of your wallet balance (e.g. 0.1 is 10%)

TRADE_LONG_FUNDS.description: Valid options: '', 'borrow min', 'borrow all', 'sell all', or 'sell largest' - see README for explanation

PRIMARY_WALLET.description: Valid options: 'margin' or 'spot' - primary wallet to execute LONG trades, it may still swap to the other if there are insufficient funds

WALLET_BUFFER.description: Decimal fraction of the total balance of each wallet that should be reserved for slippage, spread, and bad short trades (especially when rebalancing)

MAX_SHORT_TRADES.description: Maximum number of SHORT trades that can be open concurrently (i.e. limit your borrowing), zero is no limit

MAX_LONG_TRADES.description: Maximum number of LONG trades that can be open concurrently (i.e. limit borrowing or rebalancing), zero is no limit

EXCLUDE_COINS.description: Comma delimited list of coins to exclude from trading (e.g. DOGE)

STRATEGY_LOSS_LIMIT.description: Number of sequential losses before a strategy is stopped

IS_TRADE_SHORT_ENABLED.description: SHORT trades will always borrow the full funds in margin to execute, disable if you don't want this

IS_TRADE_MARGIN_ENABLED.description: Used to disable use of margin wallet trading for both LONG and SHORT trades

VIRTUAL_WALLET_FUNDS.description: The (roughly) equivalent BTC value used as the default starting balance for all virtual wallets

WEB_PASSWORD.description: password to restrict access to the internal diagnostics webserver
